channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Devastation in Gaza as Israel wages war on Hamas
item.description: Trucks carrying humanitarian aid into Gaza have begun moving ashore after arriving through a floating pier built by the US military, according to the US Central Command. Follow for live updates.

item.title: An annual rich list says Paul McCartney is Britain's first billionaire musician
item.description: Paul McCartney is a billionaire Beatle

item.title: May 16, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: Israel called South Africa the "legal arm" of Hamas on Thursday after it accused Israeli forces, in remarks at the International Court of Justice, of failing to protect civilians in the southern Gaza city of Rafah.

item.title: Massive Ukrainian drone attack on Crimea causes power cutoffs in Sevastopol
item.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin said Friday that Moscow’s offensive in Ukraine’s Kharkiv region aims to create a buffer zone but has no plans to capture the city

item.title: Trump defense grills Michael Cohen in hush money trial
item.description: The cross-examination of Michael Cohen, the prosecution's key witness in the Donald Trump criminal hush money trial, will resume Monday. Closing arguments could begin as early as Tuesday.

item.title: Trump will campaign in Minnesota after attending his son Barron's graduation
item.description: Former President Donald Trump’s break from his hush money trial in New York includes a trip to Minnesota for a Republican fundraiser in a traditionally Democratic state that he boasts he can carry in November

item.title: May 16, 2024 - Russia's war in Ukraine
item.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin has met Chinese leader Xi Jinping in Beijing, emboldened by the survival of his wartime economy and Russia's advances in Ukraine.

item.title: Yemen's Houthi rebels claim shooting down another US MQ-9 Predator drone
item.description: Yemen’s Houthi rebels have claimed the shooting-down of an American drone, hours after footage circulated online of what appeared to be the wreckage of an MQ-9 Reaper drone

item.title: Israel-Gaza live updates: US CENTCOM says trucks carrying aid to Gaza are now ashore
item.description: More than six months after Hamas terrorists invaded Israel on Oct. 7, the Israeli military continues its bombardment of the neighboring Gaza Strip.
